entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
